comments.body:
The ``license`` is not being packaged on pypi. Could you please raise an issue about it on this project?
For now, you can package it manually, please see
https://conda-forge.org/docs/maintainer/adding_pkgs.html#packaging-the-license-manually
Thanks, I reported it upstream and added a LICENSE to the recipe.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +39,43 @@  home: http://github.com/byexamples/byexample
  license: GPL-3.0
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Mix ordinary text and snippets of code in the same file and execute them as regression tests'
  description: |

comments.body:
Please add
```suggestion
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"
  entry_points:
    - byexample = byexample.byexample:main
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +14,18 @@  skip: True  # [win]
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"
  entry_points:
    - byexample = byexample.byexample:main
